content.raw: Ok, merge conflicts resolved. Also fixed two bugs I saw. `socket` was not imported which would have caused a NameError on `socket.timeout` if `check_remote_values` timed out, and there was a bytestring being included in an error message without being `.decode()`'d, that would have failed too.
content.html: Ok, merge conflicts resolved. Also fixed two bugs I saw. socket was not imported which would have caused a NameError on socket.timeout if check_remote_values timed out, and there was a bytestring being included in an error message without being .decode()'d, that would have failed too.
